__e: It was Mr MacPherson, he said that he was feeling poorly and that he wouldn't be around to see you, but he'd go straight home to bed.
A girl's out sick and I don't know where she put it.
He goes away to bother some other little boy, who didn't put his clothes away right.
B-But what about the wedding and all the money you put down for the reception? You let me worry about that.
Did you know that your mother and I often rested here?
You lose your keys, first thing you do is look everywhere you might logically have placed them.
